programPolicyMapping.description: Establish practices for protecting your company data in the event of unauthorized access through the use of encryption.

programPolicyMapping.title: Data Retention and Disposal Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Establish requirements surrounding the retention and eventual disposal of data, in order to ensure confidentiality of sensitive company and customer information.

programPolicyMapping.title: Human Resources Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Establish the requirements for a comprehensive human resources process wherein the company attracts, develops, and retains competent and high-performing individuals capable of achieving the company's business and security objectives.

programPolicyMapping.title: Vendor Management Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Establish the scope and objectives for the selection, acquisition, and management of products and services from third-party vendors, in order to maintain the security of the company's information assets that are accessible by those vendors

programPolicyMapping.title: Asset Management Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Outline guidelines and practices to protect IT assets used to access sensitive customer or company data, and ensure any such access maintains the security and confidentiality of the data.

programPolicyMapping.title: Employee Confidential Information and Inventions Assignment Agreement
programPolicyMapping.description: Employee Confidential Information and Inventions Assignment Agreement must be signed by new employees upon hire.

programPolicyMapping.description: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement Template

subsections.description: The entity obtains or generates, uses, and communicates relevant, quality information regarding the objectives related to processing, including definitions of data processed and product and service specifications, to support the use of products and services.

programControlMapping.name: Data classification
programControlMapping.description: All company and customer data is classified as per the data classification policy.

programControlMapping.name: API Documentation
programControlMapping.description:
API documentation is in place that outlines TrustCloud's API endpoints. This documentation lists each API endpoint, along with its expected inputs and outputs. 




"

subsections.description: The entity implements policies and procedures over system inputs, including controls over completeness and accuracy, to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity’s objectives.

programControlMapping.description:
API documentation is in place that outlines TrustCloud's API endpoints. This documentation lists each API endpoint, along with its expected inputs and outputs.

programControlMapping.name: Schema Validation
programControlMapping.description: The company uses schema validation to ensure that the incoming data conforms to predefined formats and types, reducing the likelihood of processing invalid data.

subsections.description: The entity implements policies and procedures over system processing to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity’s objectives.

programControlMapping.name: TLS certificates and endpoints
programControlMapping.description: TLS usage is evaluated on a quarterly basis using tools such as ssllabs and any grades lower than A are promptly corrected.

programControlMapping.name: Schema Validation
programControlMapping.description: The company uses schema validation to ensure that the incoming data conforms to predefined formats and types, reducing the likelihood of processing invalid data.

programControlMapping.description: All company and customer data is classified as per the data classification policy.

programControlMapping.name: Data store encryption

programControlMapping.name: Data in transit encryption
programControlMapping.description: Data in transit over the public Internet is encrypted with industry-standard algorithms.

programControlMapping.name: Cryptography
programControlMapping.description: The company uses widely-adopted implementations of industry standard algorithms and appropriate key lengths for all cryptography-related operations.

subsections.description: The entity implements policies and procedures to make available or deliver output completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with specifications to meet the entity’s objectives.

programControlMapping.name: Administrative access
programControlMapping.description: Administrative access privileges for sensitive systems are only granted to a restricted, small set of personnel, with a clearly defined business need to maintain and administer those systems.

programControlMapping.name: User Access Review
programControlMapping.description: User access privileges are periodically reviewed to ensure that access to data is restricted and authorized. Accounts identified as inappropriate are investigated and resolved.

programControlMapping.name: API Documentation
programControlMapping.description:
API documentation is in place that outlines TrustCloud's API endpoints. This documentation lists each API endpoint, along with its expected inputs and outputs. 




"

programControlMapping.name: API Request Logging
programControlMapping.description: All API requests and validation errors are logged and monitored systematically for maintaining data integrity and identifying potential security vulnerabilities.

programControlMapping.name: Role-based access control
programControlMapping.description: Defined permission roles are utilized to assign and segregate access privileges to data and systems.

programControlMapping.name: Customer Confidential Systems Access Review
programControlMapping.description: A review of users with access to Customer Confidential systems is performed periodically to ensure that access is restricted to appropriate personnel.

subsections.description: The entity implements policies and procedures to store inputs, items in processing, and outputs completely, accurately, and timely in accordance with system specifications to meet the entity’s objectives.

programControlMapping.name: Data Retention
programControlMapping.description: Retention periods for customer data are specified in the company's Data Retention Procedure and adhere to compliance, regulatory, contractual, and organizational requirements.

programControlMapping.name: File store encryption
programControlMapping.description: Third-party cloud filestores such as S3 and GCS are configured with a minimum server-side encryption using the vendor's key.

programControlMapping.name: Backup Retention
programControlMapping.description: Backup retention is governed by customer agreements, and business, legal and regulatory requirements.

programControlMapping.name: Backup Storage
programControlMapping.description: Backups are encrypted, stored in geographically independent regions, and have equivalent access control to the original system.

programControlMapping.name: Data store encryption
programControlMapping.description: Data stores are configured to enable encryption at rest.

programControlMapping.name: Role-based access control
programControlMapping.description: Defined permission roles are utilized to assign and segregate access privileges to data and systems.

programControlMapping.name: User Access Review
programControlMapping.description: User access privileges are periodically reviewed to ensure that access to data is restricted and authorized. Accounts identified as inappropriate are investigated and resolved.

programControlMapping.name: File systems encryption
programControlMapping.description: File systems for databases and other sensitive data storage require at least block level encryption.

programControlMapping.name: API Documentation
programControlMapping.description:
API documentation is in place that outlines TrustCloud's API endpoints. This documentation lists each API endpoint, along with its expected inputs and outputs. 




"

programControlMapping.name: Asset Disposal
programControlMapping.description: A process is in place to track and properly dispose of IT assets that have reached their end of life.

programControlMapping.name: Administrative access
programControlMapping.description: Administrative access privileges for sensitive systems are only granted to a restricted, small set of personnel, with a clearly defined business need to maintain and administer those systems.

programControlMapping.name: Customer Confidential Systems Access Review
programControlMapping.description: A review of users with access to Customer Confidential systems is performed periodically to ensure that access is restricted to appropriate personnel.

programControlMapping.name: Data Disposal
programControlMapping.description: Customer data is securely disposed of after its retention period passes, and any retained data is sanitized and anonymized.

programPolicyMapping.title: Backup Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Describe controls that are necessary to mitigate the accidental loss of data by maintaining backups.

programPolicyMapping.title: Access Control Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Establish the principles and guidelines for controlling access to company systems.

programPolicyMapping.title: Encryption Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Establish practices for protecting your company data in the event of unauthorized access through the use of encryption.

programPolicyMapping.title: Data Retention and Disposal Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Establish requirements surrounding the retention and eventual disposal of data, in order to ensure confidentiality of sensitive company and customer information.

programPolicyMapping.title: Asset Management Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Outline guidelines and practices to protect IT assets used to access sensitive customer or company data, and ensure any such access maintains the security and confidentiality of the data.

programPolicyMapping.title: Data Classification Policy
programPolicyMapping.description: Define a data classification framework that can be used to determine the sensitivity of data and systems.
